html: (2 Nephi 24:15)."The sides of the pit." Figuratively, the remotest parts of hell. John the Revelator tells us that at the commencement of the Millennium the devil will be cast into a bottomless pit with a seal set upon him that will not be broken until the end of the thousand years, when he will be "loosed a little season." (Revelation 20:2-3; see also BICQ, 221-26.)
